docs.snippet: The wear and tear of Sunday night’s overtime victory against Dallas contributed to their demise in New Orleans....
docs.lead_paragraph: The wear and tear of Sunday night’s overtime victory against Dallas contributed to their demise in New Orleans.
docs.abstract: New Orleans Pelicans beat Brooklyn Nets, 109-104, in overtime.

docs.abstract: NBA Roundup; San Antonio Spurs earn their 14th straight win with 113-91 victory over Philadelphia 76ers, who get their 25th consecutive loss; other basketball scores noted.

headline.main: 14th Straight Win by Spurs Is 25th Loss in a Row for the 76ers
headline.print_headline: 14th Straight Win by Spurs Is 25th Loss in a Row for the 76ers

docs.snippet: The Nets owner Mikhail D. Prokhorov spoke Monday of a desire to turn the team into the legal equivalent of a Russian one, but the N.B.A. denied receiving an application to transfer ownership....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Nets owner Mikhail D. Prokhorov spoke Monday of a desire to turn the team into the legal equivalent of a Russian one, but the N.B.A. denied receiving an application to transfer ownership.
docs.abstract: Brooklyn Nets owner Mikhail D Prokhorov speaks in Moscow about transferring team to a Russian-based company and his desire to turn the Nets into the legal equivalent of a Russian team; NBA denies his claim that it had given him approval to shift Nets’ ownership to any other company than its current American-based owners.

headline.main: N.B.A. Denies Clearing Nets to Become ‘Russian’
headline.print_headline: N.B.A. Denies Clearing Nets to Become ‘Russian’

docs.snippet: Irving Azoff, the music executive who often works behind the scenes, emerged into full view last week by brokering the deal that brought Phil Jackson to the Knicks as team president....
docs.lead_paragraph: Irving Azoff, the music executive who often works behind the scenes, emerged into full view last week by brokering the deal that brought Phil Jackson to the Knicks as team president.
docs.abstract: Irving Azoff, music executive who often works behind the scenes, emerges into full public view as man who helped broker deal that brought Phil Jackson to New York Knicks as team president; circumstances of Jackson's arrival underscore Azoff’s unusual relationship with James L Dolan, the executive chairman of Madison Square Garden and the owner of the Knicks.

docs.abstract: New Mexico State Athletic Director McKinley Boston says that the NCAA has apologized for making his team fly home immediately after its second-round tournament loss in Spokane, Wash, and for inadequate bus transportation.

docs.snippet: The costly systems, which can precisely record and index shots, rebounds and passes, are in use in the N.B.A. and have been adopted by Duke, Louisville and Marquette....
docs.lead_paragraph: The costly systems, which can precisely record and index shots, rebounds and passes, are in use in the N.B.A. and have been adopted by Duke, Louisville and Marquette.
docs.abstract: Next wave in technology used to analyze basketball statistics, data-tracking camera systems that have been installed in every NBA arena, has also gained a foothold in college basketball; Duke, Louisville and Marquette have installed system, developed by sports analysis company Stats LLC, possibly setting off the next arms race in college basketball for those teams that can afford it.

headline.main: College Basketball Data Aplenty for Those Who Can Afford It
headline.print_headline: College Basketball Data Aplenty for Those Who Can Afford It
